biotools.summary: Fast sequence motif identification algorithm that utilizes suffix arrays to efficiently find optimal motifs in large sequence sets (such as tens of thousands of sequences identified by chromatin or RNA immunopreciptation experiments). It uses rank-order statistics and accounts for quantitative information for each sequence.

bioschemas.name: cERMIT
